title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama official repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull & manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama—works in Node, Bun, Deno and modern browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLM or embedding providers.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, file import, RAG, admin panel) packaged as a lightweight Docker container.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Android support; offers synchronous, async and reactive APIs.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; chat, embed, list, pull and delete models via idiomatic Ruby.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI tool that wraps Ollama for quick model chats, history and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by Ollama team: use local LLMs as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook with recipes for RAG, function calling, fine-tuning, Docker & K8s deployments.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU, autoscaling and ingress.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) plus docker-compose examples for Ollama server.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + ChromaDB + Streamlit to chat with your documents.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Official Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: n8n community node to call Ollama models inside workflows (chat, generate, embed).

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Next.js chat interface for Ollama with Markdown, code highlighting and mobile PWA.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLMs via Ollama for note summarization, Q&A and rewriting.

title: ollama-mistral
summary: PyPI helper that downloads and serves the Mistral family optimized for Ollama with one command.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community-maintained Rust crate providing async/sync wrappers for the Ollama REST API.
